title: OnePlus tipped to launch ‘multiple’ foldable phones in 2023
content:
OnePlus has been a bit shy when it comes to foldables in the past, but it seems the brand is finally ready to make its move. Apparently, the first OnePlus foldable will arrive in 2023.

more…

The post OnePlus tipped to launch ‘multiple’ foldable phones in 2023 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a reliable tipster, OnePlus is set to launch multiple foldable smartphones starting in 2023, which is great news indeed!
